path_description: Add a new note and save it
expected_result: Display the saved note on the Main Page

step_desc.operation_description: Click [Add note] button to navigate to Add Note Page
Click [Save] button to save the note and return to Main Page

defects.reason: The 'Save' and 'Return' buttons have different sizes on the Main Page compared to the Add Note Page.
defects.fix_suggestion: Ensure that the 'Save' and 'Return' buttons have consistent sizes across all pages.

path_description: Search for notes from the Main Page
expected_result: Display search results on the Search Page

step_desc.operation_description: Click the [Search] button on the Main Page

defects.reason: The search results are not displayed on the Search Page as expected. The page only shows input fields without any search results.
defects.fix_suggestion: Ensure that the search results are displayed below the search input field after performing a search.

path_description: Switch to select mode for multiple notes
expected_result: Enable selection of multiple notes on the Main Page

step_desc.operation_description: Click [Select mode] button on the Main Page to enable selection of multiple notes

defects.reason: The 'Select mode' button is not visible on the Main Page, preventing the user from enabling the selection of multiple notes.
defects.fix_suggestion: Ensure the 'Select mode' button is present and visible on the Main Page to allow users to switch to select mode.

path_description: Access settings to navigate to Preferences Page
expected_result: Display Preferences Page with settings options

step_desc.operation_description: Click [Settings] button to navigate to Preferences Page

path_description: Switch between edit and view mode on the Note Editing Page
expected_result: Toggle between edit and view mode on the Note Editing Page

step_desc.operation_description: Click [Switch Edit Mode] button to toggle between edit and view mode on the Note Editing Page

defects.reason: The screenshot does not show a button labeled 'Switch Edit Mode', which is necessary to toggle between edit and view modes.
defects.fix_suggestion: Add a 'Switch Edit Mode' button to the Note Editing Page to allow users to toggle between modes.
